name: Collect iT 3D
summary:
Do you like puzzle type of games?
Well, this one will be fun, because it is physics-based where you have to collect all balls and have them all added into the basket or the bin. In other words, you have to arrange things on each level where all yellow balls fall into the bin.
You control a magic saw that can cut through platforms in order to make a clear path for the balls to move. Each level has a different setup and some levels are relatively easy to play. It gets more challenging as you progress, so there's definitely a level progression. You have an option to skip a level if it is too challenging, but that's up to you.
